attributes.action: STOP ROAD CHARGING TRIALS & LISTEN TO THE PEOPLE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We insist that you start listening to the millions of people that have made it clear, WE DO NOT WANT ROAD CHARGING!

Mrs Thatcher was forced to listen when Her government tried to force the Poll Tax on the nation.  Mr Blair you are now acting exactly the same way with road charging.  We the undersigned will not go quietly away. We fully intend to fight you!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
